descriptionParagraphs: Gataca is a cybersecurity company that provides decentralized digital identity management technology.
If you're passionate about using technology for good, eager to work on cutting-edge projects and be part of a fast-growing company, we'd love to have you on our team.
firstSection.title: Join Gataca!

secondSection.description: Our organizational ethos is shaped by these principles:

list.description: We ensure everyone on the team feels free to express their opinions, share their ideas, and ask questions without fear of judgment, fostering a culture of transparency and trust
list.title: Open environment

list.description: We have a positive and energetic atmosphere that encourages fun and enjoyment in the workplace, and we always try to keep an optimistic attitude even in challenging times
list.title: Optimism

list.description: We provide the necessary flexibility to keep a healthy professional-life balance, whether that means working from home or having the ability to adjust schedules.
list.title: People first

list.description: We foster a growth mindset where employees are not afraid to take risks and support them in their pursuit of knowledge and skill development.
list.title: Learning

list.description: We trust that everyone on the team is working towards a shared vision and understand their role in the organization's success
list.title: Commitment

list.description: We recognize and celebrate diversity and encourage everyone to bring their authentic selves to work
list.title: Inclusiveness

list.description: We work towards our objectives with a purpose, emphasizing results and outcomes
list.title: Objective-oriented

secondSection.title: Company culture
